ai-thig10.1:1.2_0: the sages have praised good friendship.
ai-thig10.1:2.3_0: Should you associate with good people,
ai-thig10.1:2.4_0: were to be released from all suffering.
ai-thig10.1:4.2_0: The man whose voice had been shown by a man,
ai-thig10.1:4.3_0: ‘and for a co-wife it’s especially so.
ai-thig10.1:5.1_0: some women even cut their own throat,
ai-thig10.1:5.3_0: Being guilty of killing a person,
ai-thig10.1:6.1_0: “I was on the road and about to give birth.,
ai-thig10.1:6.2_0: when I saw my husband dead.
ai-thig10.1:6.3_0: I gave birth there on the road
ai-thig10.1:6.4_0: before I’d reached my own house.
ai-thig10.1:7.2_0: and on the road my husband lies dead—oh woe is me!
ai-thig10.1:8.1_0: “Oh woe is you whose family is lost,
ai-thig10.1:9.2_0: I saw my son’s flesh being eaten.
ai-thig10.1:9.3_0: With my family destroyed, condemned by all,
ai-thig10.1:9.4_0: and my husband dead, I realized the deathless.
ai-thig10.1:10.1_0: I’ve developed the noble eightfold path
ai-thig10.1:10.4_0: as seen in the mirror of the Dhamma.
ai-thig10.1:11.2_0: for what you have done is what you need.
ai-thig10.1:13.1_0: The Book of the Elevens is finished.
